name: Wreckless Birds
description:
My second game, only 10 levels (might add more). Second game jam too, first was GBJAM. Very bizarre ideas in this jam. Took me forever to find an idea that can be made into a game.

Made in GameMaker: Studio Professional

░░░░ GAME IDEA
░░░░ ░░░░
░░░░ IT'S ANGRY BIRDS
░░░░ BUT THEY'RE NOT ANGRY
░░░░ SO THEY'RE JUST DESTROYING EVERYTHING
░░░░ FOR NO REASON
